summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 10.4°C), outside temperature (down 10.1°C), and inside temperature (down 1.7°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 13%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 401 m) and light levels (up 8623 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), light levels (up 12963 lux), and cloud levels (up 285 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, low humidity will be noticeable and light winds will prevail. Chance of light rain, low clouds are expected, possibly some fog or persistent clouds, and a mix of sun and clouds. Little change in the weather.
